attributes.title: Unsatisfactory
attributes.review: Right away I was asked for money... I don’t have a lot of money. He has sooo much money already why are we supposed to give him money. I regret downloading this.

attributes.title: Very bad app ❗️😠
attributes.review: Everyday i get notifications from the app saying I’m fat and ugly. Also every time I open the app my phone makes I really loud screeching noise. Plus the owner of the app is really racist. <3

attributes.title: TAKE THIS APP DOWN !!!
attributes.review: first of all this app kept crashing and it even almost hacked me !!! This is not a lie 🙄🙄 And plus that the app even almost deleted everything I have in my phone ?!!! TAKE THIS DOWN NOW !!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: i cannot believe it. i opened the app for the first time and it said “ error, white person not found “ wow! they found out i’m not a white suprematist through my face id!

attributes.title: Tremendous disappointment
attributes.review: I thought the app was going to be 2,020  ways to remove Trump from office but I was wrong, I am tremendously disappointed. Worst app ever. You dropped this 🔴 put it back on your nose 🤡✨🥰

attributes.title: Omg just NO 🤢🤮🤡🤡🤡🤡
attributes.review: First you get greeted by a NAKED  dancing CLOWN who then tells you he has free candy, then you see a cat on top of a piece of cornbread and is saying “APPLE SAUSE” then you see photos of a CHEETO next to his twin TRUMP! That made me cry so hard my nose hairs came out! ABSOLUTELY disgusting! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: WHY
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen. Like why is there this dusty Cheeto on the cover. I had to clean my eyes out with holy water after. Disgusting. 0/10 hate it please take it down for the sake of the people sir-

attributes.title: COW FECES AND MOTHS??
attributes.review: absolutely terrible app i downloaded it and it made my entire house smell of cow feces and skid marks. there are moths crawling out of my eyes and caterpillars in my nostrils all because of this foul app. my toilet clogged and the sewage it spewed seemed to spell out in LITERAL HUMAN FECES “TRUMP 2020” ON MY BATHROOM FLOOR??? and not to mention the NINJAS SENT TO MY HOME????

attributes.title: Worst app ever delete now
attributes.review: It’s the worst first off all because obviously it’s Donald trump 🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤧 and just don’t download it it’s the worst there are things in there you don’t want to see it read

attributes.title: BUNKER BOY
attributes.review: Ok first of all, I opened the app and a gross, tiny handed cheeto boy was there on the screen. gross, right? also he hates minorities and wants to create a facist government in the US: how funky and fresh. So I am not for that or any of his bunker boy antics, so BYE. terrible app. terrible. absolutely deplorable.
